participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and analytical, I thrive on challenges and enjoy engaging in outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.

participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, I enjoy connecting with others and fostering a love for learning in my students.
